title: Koala Boy Kokki (The Adventures of the Little Koala)
synopsis: A little koala and his friends have adventures together and learn lessons about the world while having a lot of fun.
staff: [['Ishiguro, Megumu', ['Director']], ['Yamada, Katsuhisa', ['Storyboard']], ["D'Avena, Cristina", ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Watanabe, Takashi', ['Animation Director']]]
